name: A Sweet Journey 2017
description:
A SWEET JOURNEY has been selected as a Best Student Project finalist for the 2017 Unity Awards!

Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Embark on an amazing journey with the Sugar Cubes! Turn them into caramel or marshmallow to safeguard them, and make them slide all the way to a house where the mysterious Mister Rabbit awaits.

Platform : Mobile/Tablet / Engine : Unity 3D
Number of players : 1

Producer : Paul-Emile LE REUN
Game Design : Alexandre ALLAIS, Antonin BOURRON
Game Art : Thomas GOUBIER, Dylan EURLINGS, Célia DEJOU
Game Design & Programming : Dimitri POMIER, Pierre MACHKOVSKY, Guillaume LOYER
Music & Sound Design : Nicolas LORION
